title: Solar PV capacity - new installations worldwide by country 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of newly installed capacity in the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
The highest value at Country China is 45.0x times more than the lowest value at Netherlands.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of newly installed capacity for 10 number of Countrys.
Country China has the highest Percentage of newly installed capacity and Netherlands has the lowest Percentage of newly installed capacity.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of newly installed capacity in the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
The highest value at Country China is 45.0x times more than the lowest value at Netherlands.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of newly installed capacity in the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of newly installed capacity 45.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Netherlands where Country is 1.0.
Second maximum Percentage of newly installed capacity is found at Country US.
There is a difference of 44.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Netherlands.
The Country China has the highest Percentage of newly installed capacity, followed by US, and US. Down to the Country Netherlands which is the lowest.
Country India, and US have the same Percentage of newly installed capacity.
The Country China has 5.06 times more Percentage of newly installed capacity than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 89.0.
